Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the abatement of graffiti on commercial and residential buildings and repealing subdivisions d, e and f of section 10-117.3 of the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the failure to remove graffiti from commercial and residential buildings and the city’s removal of such graffiti through nuisance abatement proceedings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Abatement of graffiti on commercial and residential buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the abatement of graffiti on commercial and residential buildings and repealing subdivisions d, e and f of section 10-117.3 of the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the failure to remove graffiti from commercial and residential buildings and the city’s removal of such graffiti through nuisance abatement proceedings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the abatement of graffiti on commercial and residential buildings and repealing subdivisions d, e and f of section 10-117.3 of the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the failure to remove graffiti from commercial and residential buildings and the city’s removal of such graffiti through nuisance abatement proceedings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the abatement of graffiti on commercial and residential buildings and repealing subdivisions d, e and f of section 10-117.3 of the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the failure to remove graffiti from commercial and residential buildings and the city’s removal of such graffiti through nuisance abatement proceedings.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Abatement of graffiti on commercial and residential buildings.
